attributes.review: Do not get this app unless you want a million viruses to be unleashed into your phone. I opened the app and five minutes into using it so many glitches, my phone broke down and just left a black screen with the words Save Barron Trump. I also hated all of the displeasing adds that it was covered with. I kept seeing these pictures of an orange cockatoo trying to tell me what to do like vote for this racist republican and defy health officials, basically do everything that one should not do. Seriously this app is the worst there are many better resources I recommended using like the daily news.
attributes.title: Virus war

attributes.review: okaySo I open the app and I just see this giant Cheeto standing there and it almost gives me a heart attack and it was just so scary and then I keep clicking on it and it hacked my phone and now my phone is glitching so bad and we have to take it to the store to fix it and first of all my mom is in my like all my families in the hospital from it because it really like like it scared them and it was just a giant shadow or an orange I don’t know it was just sitting there and it was so weird and disgusting it was horrible I hope this app gets banned and I mean banned forever this app is horrible. #Goalttiktok
attributes.title: this app is HORRIBLE #alt

attributes.review: I thought this was some type of clown hiring app and when I got it I saw this big nasty disturbing photo of a fat Cheeto. I thought it was just a glitch but it asked for my information and well since I am looking for a clown for a birthday party soon I gave it my info. Now I’m scared for my life because the Cheeto looks like a rapist, racist, and a fascist. Also every other clown seems to still be wearing a mask for their upcoming jobs but not this one! The app even asked me to help the man win the 2020 election. Yeah right I’m not crazy! the You guys should really evaluate this man. If I could give this zero stars I would❤️
attributes.title: Sickening 🤢

attributes.review: 🤢🤢🤢 this app is NOT user friendly at all, it’s so difficult to use, I couldn’t even log in because of how bad it was. First off, the format is horrendous,  and when I tried to put in my phone number the app popped a notification that said “Try again, Fagg*t” which I found very disrespectful. The app asks you what race you are but the only options are “white” and “delete app”. Not to mention their mascot, an old white man with a terrible fake tan doing a white supremacist hand gesture, it makes me feel unsafe. I would NOT recommend this app to ANYBODY who has a brain. Good day
attributes.title: Never again!!!

attributes.review: I went to take my pet burrito on a walk today and I downloaded the app while we were trying to tame a dragon. Suddenly a GHAST spawned out of no where and blew up my house!😪 I got mad and pulled my Russian Beam 47 out of my back pocket to blast the fool but Trevor took my burrito and threw it into the lava pool😭 I tried to speed run build my nether portal to get away but they weren’t goin for none😫🤦‍♂️ I undownloaded the app and everything despawned but then my game glitched out because of the stupid bug and I lost my seed😭😭😭😪 I don’t know what to do with my life my entire world was destroyed by this app I hope God strikes it down
attributes.title: Just an awful app🤮

attributes.review: I just downloaded it to be getting some news like some normal PERSON. THEN I SEE THIS CHEETOS MICRO, NONEXISTENT, TINY, LITTLE PEE!!!!!! I’m very disappointed in a person we already call are president, for his choices and we’ll just him in general!! And when I get in this app I see his PEEEEE?!?!?! NOOOOOOOO NOOOOOOOOOOO NOOOOOOOOOOO!!!!! I broke my phone when I saw it! My eyes my POOR POOR POOOOOOR EYES, I started crying! I couldn’t unseen what I saw or didn’t see in that fact. He’s RAPIST, RACIST, and a pain in my booty and many others! I WISH HE WAS NEVER EVER OUR PRESIDENT!!!! He doesn’t deserve that title not one bit! attributes.title: THE HELL IS THIS APP 😭(I DID NOT DOWNLOAD IT TO SEE PORN)

attributes.review: horrible this app took so long to download it was downloading for at least 4 hours. Once it did finally download I opened the app and it immediately kicked me out and started glitching. I had to restart my phone several times in order for it to work at all. Once i got the app to start working i noticed that is is very glitchy and full of bugs. It made my phone crash so many times. I finally had to delete the app because I can’t take it crashing my phone. Because of all of the issues the app is hardly usable and is in no way useful.
attributes.title: Horrible

attributes.review: The FitnessGram Pacer Test is a multistage aerobic capacity test that progressively gets more difficult as it continues. The 20 meter pacer test will begin in 30 seconds. Line up at the start. The running speed starts slowly but gets faster each minute after you hear this signal bodeboop. A sing lap should be completed every time you hear this sound. ding Remember to run in a straight line and run as long as possible. The second time you fail to complete a lap before the sound, your test is over. The test will begin on the word start. On your mark. Get ready!… Start.
attributes.title: do this test you fatass Cheeto puff

attributes.review: Every time I tried to open then app one of my apps would be deleted! Then once all my apps were deleted it started to delete my family’s app. I was angry!!! I did not like this. After a hour everybody’s apps on my family’s phone were gone! But that’s not all. Soon my roof tiles were starting to disappear!!!! We couldn’t stop it! And slowly my house was starting to disappear. Until we lost are entire house! All we had was each other are phones with NO apps. And are dogs. We are homeless now, we are starving and one of are dogs already died... all because of this app.
attributes.title: Worst app ever!

attributes.review: I don’t even know where to start. This app gave my phone the most terrible virus I had to get a whole new one 😡😤. I couldn’t even do anything else on my phone it was being spammed so much! Saying things like give money to Trump to help this orange get reelected in the office!! This went on to the point where it was unable to use my phone if I didn’t promise to SELL MY SOUL TO TRUMP and give all my hard earned assets to the Trump foundation or they would send trumps ninjas to attack me into doing so themselves!!!! I am beyond angry I don’t even know how to comprehend this situation!! Whatever you DO NOT download this app!! 😖😤🖕
attributes.title: 💥NEVER AGAIN💥
